meanings.sent1: He felt incapable of solving the math problem.
meanings.sent2: She is incapable of lifting heavy objects due to her injury.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed incapable of catching the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: The old car was incapable of reaching high speeds.
meanings.sent5: The leaky roof was incapable of keeping out the rain.

meanings.definition: Lacking the necessary ability or skill
meanings.sent1: The young child was incapable of tying his shoelaces.
meanings.sent2: The new employee was incapable of operating the complex machinery.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy waiter was incapable of serving without spilling.
meanings.sent4: Her worn-out shoes were incapable of providing proper support.
meanings.sent5: The rusty lock was incapable of keeping the door secure.
